message.name: ERR_MISSING_REOPEN_REASON
message.locale: The reason for the Program Reopen must be entered

message.name: ERR_MISSING_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_STATUS_ID
message.locale: The status of the Program Application to be reopened must be entered

message.name: ERR_REOPEN_TIMERS_NOT_COMPLETED_EXIST
message.locale: Unable to reopen this program as there are still timers existing that have not being completed
